General.Name: Tsentr Mezhdunarodnoy Torgovli PAO
General.Description: Joint Stock Company World Trade Center Moscow operates business complex in Russia. It provides conference, exhibition center, hotel, seminar, symposiums, business meeting, banquets and shows, and restaurant services. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Moscow, Russia.
